imdb.plot outline: A young man that has lived his whole life trying to amount to what his father wants him to be gets sent through a roller coaster of events after he catches his best friend and fiancé in bed together the night before their wedding and ends up having to attend Addiction Recovery meetings for the actions he's taken. While in the meetings he comes across other people dealing with their own addictions along with others there to support friends/family. He starts befriending people in the sessions, while finding out deeper issues about them, and finding his true self and possibly true love.
imdb.title: Recovery
plot: A young man that has lived his whole life trying to amount to what his father wants him to be gets sent through a roller coaster of events after he catches his best friend and fiancé in bed together the night before their wedding and ends up having to attend Addiction _Recovery_ (qv) meetings for the actions he's taken. While in the meetings he comes across other people dealing with their own addictions along with others there to support friends/family. He starts befriending people in the sessions, while finding out deeper issues about them, and finding his true self and possibly true love.::Paul Anthony Sonnier Jr
